description: RIA-1794 Request response review direction to legal representative

replacements.sendDirectionExplanation:
The respondent has replied to your appeal argument and evidence. You must now review their response.

Next steps
If you would like to respond, you must email the Tribunal caseworker within 5 days.
If you do not respond within 5 days, the case will automatically go to hearing.
